name: Annihilation (itch) (Pampou, Lage Legend)
description:
Game prototype created for the VIDEO Game LAB jam 2021. The theme announced was : Arcade.

Created by Lage Legend and Pampou

Tools used

- Unity with URP (bundled with shader graph and post processing)

- Cinemachine

- Timeline

- DoTween

- Blender

- Font Commando on dafont

- Bfrx

- FL studio

Songs used

Sagittarius V - Lucidator :

Rameses B - Hardwired :
